_sText: Map by `Mr.Neko

My first zombie escape map, get on the streets and into the catacombs to escape by boat.

Make v.2

Prequel to ze_blackmesa_escape
--------------------------------------
Taking place in New Mexico, the BlackMesa Research Facility has gone offline with no contact to the outside world. The government sent Spec-Ops to clear the facility for any survivors but an infection rings out and you must escape the facility.

Features the following:
-2 spawns CT/T
-6 different routes
-Bridge
-Rail Cart
-Blackmesa Tram
-Secret Rave Room

_aChangeLog.text: Reworked bossfight to make it a bit easier

_sText:
Map I made under 10 days for unloze mapping contest.

csgo port : https://gamebanana.com/maps/212264
Medium/long zombie escape map whitch works balanced to both, zombies and humans.Escape way can be little complicated at the start but easy after few rounds.

Remake of another old maps I made years ago, kind of a combination of the ze_ocean_escape maps, hope you enjoy it.

***Version 2***

- Reworked Spawn, 
When round begins the Spawning room is locked for 60secs. One of the three routes will be randomly opened. Zombies should be set to spawn at or around the 30secs mark to give zombies around 20secs to infect any CTs before they are teleported to the route around 50secs mark. 
- (Middle) Ship Route's Fire room is now a Fire Pit room in which CTs must scale along the broken pipes
- (Right) Modern Route now has a 20secs Lift Cts must defend
- (Left) Old Route is darker and less lit
- Improved FPS
- Emergency Door removed
- Weapons tables moved infront of Submarine catwalk

***Version 3***

- Console commands and props added to better help direct players
- Spawn room size increased with 10 different hold areas as well as the initial hold time decreased to 45 seconds
- (Middle) Ship Route's Fire room pipes rearranged and pit block added for any zombies nocked down into
- Fixed minor bugs and errors

***Version 4***

- Added Music
- Added 3 Dummy ideas
- Added a few decals
- Added Zombie spawn command for 15 seconds
- Added lighting for overhead Submarine ladder and console
- 1/3 chance on which path is chosen
- Zombie delay on path choice 5~7 seconds
- OLD PATH darkened with a few props removed
- MODERN PATH tram messages fixed and 5 seconds add onto hold time and a few props removed
- Ladders remade
- Final section door blocks removed with a few light, all lights in section are now RED

hello everyone, this is my new map on counter-strike: source for the mod ze_



ENJOY! :)

* 2 difficulty stage
* 1 boss(stage 2)
* no custom particles
* no item

This is the first CSGO map ze_no_title ported to the CSS version

Since this is the first CSS mapping, there may be a bug that is not in the CSGO version.

If you find bug please report to my steamprofile
link : https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198057609746/

Have fun

Original(CSGO)ver : https://gamebanana.com/maps/207314

Time Splitters Notre Dame V1 - Release Date 10/01/2013

Visit - www.lagmasters.co.uk for more Source development work

Installation Instructions:
Please place inside your Couter Strike Source Map Folder

Map Version: Version 1.3

IMPORTANT: PLEASE MAKE SURE YOU HAVE NOBLOCK MOD RUNNING

Credits:
- Based off the Time Splitters 2 - Notre Dame
- CSS Map created by: Mononoke
- Time Splitters 2 Music & Models belongs to respective owners
- Catherdral Textures belong to respective owners

Contact Email: mononokie12@gmail.com

Notes:
- New Boss System implemented but it required me to make an extra area.
- Boss Health +125 per CT in boss room.
- AI Zombies have 650HP each. Headshots only.
- Pickup Items by picking up duel elites. Cool down of 1 minute each

Fixes/New Features
- Fixed Broken Teleport
- Linked ground floor spawns to help zombies if they get stuck in one area
- Extra spawn path for zombies to help push humans into the first defence room, rather than hide by the gutter gate.
- Moved guttergate forward so CT's cannot defend and bottle neck  approaching zombies. 
- Increased shotgun force to actually do some damage
- Newly implemented boss system using math counter. System required me to make a new boss room (slightly bland but it works for now)
- Use nades on boss to do 50 damage
- Boss will follow players rather than get stuck
- Added alternative path at wood stairs to stop CT's defending too early. Climb ropes between concrete supports.
- Added slight hint to theme of my next map


Previous Fixes
- Recreated ending of map (Notre Dame Tower Climb)
- Item cool down is now 1 minute to stop spamming.
- Map Timer changed to 10 minutes
- Added explosion effect to Undead Priest Item
- Fixed func_brush which was not resetting causing the map to block after first round
- Packed Maiden Model Texture
- Added Extra tunnels to avoid bottle neck in final defence room
- Fixed Crypt Zombie Health
- Increased all AI zombie health to 650
- Added interactive components to Catacomb
- Reduced zombie walk speed for realistic effect
- Added  Character item Viola - 5 Second Speed Boost / 30 Second Cooldown
- Added  Character item Hunchback - Shotgun Push / 30 Second Cooldown
- Added  Character item Undead Priest - Set zombies on fire for 10 seconds / 30 Second Cooldown
- Added higher door blocking damage for Wine Cellar


Known Issues/Future Improvements
- Character models start randomly moving (this is something I cannot control due to parenting the models. Tried recompiling but it did nothing).
- Boss Balancing
- Tweak Items if required
- Tweak Item Trigger Heights if required
- Balancing and Bug fixing dependant on community feedback.

Note
- Unless anything is majorly broken, this will be the last release of the map. Working on my new map if you can guess what it is :)

My Other Time Splitters Map:
Zombie Escape - Time Splitters Virtual - http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/167314

Zombie Escape - Time Splitters Virtual - http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/167314

### ZE_NOIR

I've been working on this map for about 2 or 3 weeks. I've always liked futuristic environments in the vein of Blade Runner, and for long I've thought to do a map following that kind of style. However, I never decided to do it since I felt I'd ruin it. I still think I have.

Noir takes place in a not-so-distant future. Fog, dust, rust and trash fill everything. Starting at the depths of the sewage/underground system, players must reach one of the final locations (the map, however, is linear and one of those is opened up by the players' actions). The average length of a round should be 8 minutes and a bit more (which is perhaps a bit too much, I know), and it should be done fastly enough since (as explained in the map's plot in the selection menu) there is an autonuke at 0:15.

### Features

- 64 spawnpoints
- Cubemaps
- 3DSkybox
- Color correction
- Puzzles
- Holding
- A bit of detail
- Decal overflows because I don't care
- Music (from Vangelis)
- Ambience

I didn't bother with a radar yet just as I didn't bother with a few other final touches like having map-specific CVars. Those will come as new versions come.

### Future version

I plan to add levels where the endings are (in fact one of them is already started) that will then merge into one final, probably hard ending. I am also debating whether I should or should not add special weapons, but that will depend on how the map performs as-is. I believe special weapons wouldn't fit the map probably (and I think they're boring because most of them have ended up being cheap copypaste to bring an 'epic' factor that can't be copied since it is inherent to specific maps). Still, we will see.

Bug reports, as always, are welcome; don't confuse, however, difficulty with bugs and/or glitches. There might be paths left open to make chokepoints harder just as there might be ways to advance further quicker: it is recommended to use them if found so the timer doesn't run up.

INFO
--------------------------------------------------------------
The [C]RIPPIN [V]irus (CV) (From the movie, I Am Legend) has been spreading all the way from New York to this little island, the military base is on a small island next to your island. Their airplane (The Harrier) is waiting for the last survivors to get off the infected island so they can bomb it.


CREDITS
--------------------------------------------------------------

warfactory by: Hamster

Another version... i'm sorry for this, but this is a bug i had to fix, because it made server crash (tested on Supreme elite)

 - Fixed bug that made server crash (too much ammo from entity game_player_equip)
 - Door to the guide now opens after 20 seconds, to prevent from extreme camping inside if zm infested the bunker

Version 2.6 released, needed to fix some stuff

 - Fixed afk teleports not working
 - Fixed boss eye freezer, that allowed you to use laser before the wall breaks
 - Fixed end trigger that gives 1 hp to zm when portal closed (wasn't working)
 - Fixed Berserker (invulnerability now works)
 - Added another way to fetch the guide, now random between this new way and the old way
 - Added songs to DJ room
 - Added a respawn for dead players

Version 2.5 quick released, i found an unexpected bug, which allows ct to swim the underground sea.... That wasn't supposed to be possible, so i added a push.

 - Fixed : Simming possibility in underground sea

Back with this version 2.4 that improves the gameplay quality and the fun. Here are the changes since version 2.3 : 

 - Fixed some little bugs, like the boat stuck, now afk teleports this area too.
 - Removed Final Flash weapon, causing a too large and to sudden balance. (+ avoid raging zombies)
 - Changed Boats cover, now zombies can't attack from water, they attack from side paths.
 - Improved boss fight, now the controller is alone in a room so that other zm don't make him blind + now the boss has a freeze, activable by the controller, and also small eyes are activable, not auto-controlled anymore.
 - Added 2 zm weapons : the stopper (like the one in paranoid) and the shocker, that slow near cts.
 - Added 2 ct weapons, the heal gun and the berserker (20 sec of invulnerability for the owner, useful to use knife against zm)
 - End rules changed, zm have no more 300 HP when they take the portal. Now the keep their health until portal is closed, and have then 1 HP left.
 - Added 2 secret Trail cuts
 - Added a DJ Room inaccessible with noclip, only if you know the secret teleport (room for me and Zip)

That's all for a version 2, next one will be version 3 with levels, but only if, i hope, i can manage to fix huge bugs with hammer (some burshes count as more than 500 faces and i don't know why, so i'm almost to the max_numplanes)

Thanks for playing and leaving feddback :)

ZE_MUMBO_JUMBO Edited by: £cho Remake Time: 5hrs. Recommended Player Count: 20-30 Maximum Players: 64 A remake of zm_melong_dow_deathwater_b1... Click Here to View Original Map While this map is a remake, drastic changes have been made to the map. It's been textured, has some actual lighting, a new custom skybox, added decals/overlays, and the gameplay has been changed so that it fits the title of Zombie Escape. The map has been fully tested for any bugs and since there are simply none to be found, it has been released. Players start off at the spawn, below all the madness. They must work together to break the glass and climb the stairs, or may risk going on their own and climbing the ladders that surround the cliffs. It's a sort of maze-like puzzle and you have choices as to which route you would like to take. Once a player reaches the top, they press a button which will deactivate the flood gates below, flooding the entire complex from top to bottom. When this occurs, it's a race to the top, and in the meantime you must fend off the zombies presumably coming from four directions. The round ends when the water reaches the top and after all zombies and/or humans have been killed. This map truly is a lot of fun and while it didn't take too long to make, it looks very nice and the gameplay is very unique. It's worth giving the map a try on your server and seeing if the players like it. I have a running bet that they will if they're looking for new escape maps. Anyhow, as always, comments, assessments, and stamps are more than welcome. Thanks in advance for your comments and enjoy the new map! I hope to see this on some servers soon. =D Regards, £cho

From the creator of over 10 maps based on Portal!

Now comes the sequel to my ze_ApertureScience map!

After escaping GLaDOS, humans encounter an empty facility. Motanum Inc. This industry is dedicated to producing boats and helicopter. What a coincidence for humans!

************
How to play!
************

Note, you will usually have to press a button to activate certain things (It has a green light, and turns to red when it has been activated. Console will let you know of certain waiting times)

First, simply try to get on the boat hangar, and defend from any zombies. When the time comes get on the boat and get on the wall in the fortress. Humans who failed to get on the boat will be teleported to a place where they are easy target for zombies. Zombie shave then 30 seconds to get on the helicopter.

The helicopter will try to overfly above the fortress. If this happens Humans are dead! So you must shoot the helicopter down before its too late! (Note, shoot with your weapons, the more people that shoot at it, the faster it gets shoot down. There is no timer, or any kind of special artillery. YOU MUST DO THE SHOOTING, so organize your teammates to defend and not to stand around being dumb)

Given that you shoot down the helicopter, defend the entrance fort entrance as usuall, then when the boxes you are defending break, it means is time to fall back. Simply enter the bunker. Keep shooting, as zombies might try to get you. Press the console in the bunker. Get to the elevator quickly! defend for a small time before the elevator leaves.

Then find your way to the underground boat. Get on it. And when its time, the boat leaves (Fail humans will be teleported again, so for your own good, don't hide). Shoot off any zombies trying to boat jump! After, enter the hallway. The door will open when you are close to it. But before you enter, be sure to get healed to 100 hp! It's imperative you get healed. After about 10 seconds, zombies will be able to enter the hallway and try to penetrate the small bunker you are defending from. Zombies can get healed back to 2500 (Its fired to a zombie on the healing place every second. Note that if you have over 2500 hp, you will be brought down to 2500 hp)

Once the doors close, simply go to the vent, and climb as fast as you can! Explosions will be behind you! This is where those 100 hp come handy! get on the chopper and you have survived to escape another day!

**end**

FEATURES
-A destructible helicopter! Must shoot it to easily defend yourself
-6 secrets, 3 for humans, 3 for zombies!
-Balanced, yet challenging gameplay
-Heli's hp depends on people playing, so play with 10 or play with 70!
-custom textures
-custom models
-New game-play mechanics in a zombie escape!
-Exiting ending!
-extremely optimized!
-detailed map!
-Includes Sountrack!
-Actor voice!

What are you waiting download it and upload it to your server now!

For the interested people

Heli's HP = 225(number of players that entered the lobby)
So, if zombies spawn from the spawning zone, then they do get counted twice. It is alright, don't worry about that

Developed by Eugenio 'Motanum' Roman
Bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com

More maps from me to come

Special thanks to Uber Micro Forums for their support and guidance.
Sponsored by ]Hell[ Servers

See screenshots

Installation, just paste the all of the files in the rar on your maps folder for counter strike source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

****************************
----------UPDATE 2!!!----------
****************************

Changes
-Fixed many map exploits
-Added some teleports to force players to where they are supposed to be
-Added teleports that teleport behind players to a place where they are vulnerable to zombies
-Optimized the boat a bit to minimize some lag
-optimized some part of the map
-shorter hold parts
-Change final path for fallen zombies so it is easier to get to the attack place
-change holding points to be more efficient in defending against zombies
-more hp to helicopter and it goes slightly faster. Face a real challenge
Overall, this version (b3) should play more as intended
**On the zombiecopter place, there is a place where slow/fallen/camping huamns get teleported to be easily killed by zombies. This should prevent camping and make more of a challenge!


****************************
----------UPDATE 1----------
****************************

Changes
-Fixed some map exploits
-added clip to some part of the maps
-added afk killer
-fixed boat so people don't fall of it so often


From the creator of over 10 maps based on Portal!

Now comes the sequel to my ze_ApertureScience map!

After escaping GLaDOS, humans encounter an empty facility. Motanum Inc. This industry is dedicated to producing boats and helicopter. What a coincidence for humans!

After using the boat to escape into a bunker before the Motanum Inc Weapons Of Mass Destruction become unstable and blow up! But watch out. Helicopter full of zombies will be heading your way! you must shoot it down before it is too hard to defend!

FEATURES
-A destructible helicopter! Must shoot it to easily defend yourself
-custom textures
-custom models
-New game-play mechanics in a zombie escape!
-extremely optimized!
-detailed map!

What are you waiting download it and upload it to your server now!

Currently it may be a bit unbalanced during the helicopter shoot out. I still need to find a good health number for the helicopter. Watch my profile for any updates on this map which may come soon. I do not forget my maps. So if you think something is very hard or very easy in this map, contact me. My details are in the next paragraph.

Conclusion, play the map on your server. And then please let me know what I can do to make it more balanced. More helicopter hp? slower helicopter? faster heli? Shorter holding times?

Developed by Eugenio 'Motanum' Roman
Bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com

More maps from me to come

Special thanks to Uber Micro Forums for their support and guidance.
Sponsored by ]Hell[ Servers

See screenshots

Installation, just paste the all of the files in the rar on your maps folder for counter strike source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

_sText:
Hey, 

Here is my second zombie escape map.

ze_minimal is based on kz_bhop_minimal, a map I made around 2 years ago.
The lightning, textures and the atmosphere is really similar.
I added a bit of kz triggers but didnt want to force the map to be "ze_kz". So its actually doable if you have correct movements skill.

The map have 4 stages.

Stage 1, Cyan.
Stage 2, Green.
Stage 3, Purple.
Stage 4, Blue.

There is 12 items in total. 6 for humans and 6 for zombies. All items are unlocked on stage 4.
The map is kinda challenging and need good teamplay.

If you have any suggestion on how the map can be improve or any report you can send me a message on discord (m4dara#9181).

Special thanks to Unloze and Nide that allow me to test beta version on their public server.

Special thanks to Moltard for the global help around hammer.

Good luck and have fun!

Minecraft_v1_1


Fixed The boat properly this time :S


Few balence tweaks towards zombies

New version of my 2 years old one-staged bad looking Minecraft map. Some people forced me to work on it. So it's here...

Map Features
==================
- 64 spawns
- Radar
- Custom end round overlays for ZR
- Minecraft songs
- Minecraft player model with 13 random skins
- Minecraft style obstacles (like solving redstone puzzles, using pickaxe to build Nether portal, activating portal using flint and steel)
- 4 different levels
    1. Overworld
    2. The Nether
    3. Jungle
    4. The End
- 2 bossfights
    1. Ghast
    2. Ender dragon
- special items
    1. Sword
    2. Bow
    3. Flint and steel
    4. Block builder
    5. Cake (Heal)
    6. Torches
    - Every item is filtered, others can't spam it


My [todo list/changelog](http://db.tt/rtGWilF4). Lines marked with * are done, - means to-do.


How to disable Minecraft player models
==================
If player skins are broken/not working/you don't want them on your server you can disable them kinda easily. Just follow any of these steps.

### Option 1
Simplest way is pressing 'Disable skins' button in Admin room. Once you press it it will disable until the map is changed. You will have to do it every time the map is played though.

### Option 2
You can use my [config](https://db.tt/yZrfNEV8) that will automatically do it. You have to put it in your server into **cstrike\cfg**. Works every time.

### Option 3
Make sure to execute command **minecraft_noskins** using your own config that gets executed with the map.

AUTHOR: Coop
email: MechatonicsEng@hotmail.com

You've been sent into the desert to investigate a test facility that has apparently dug up some pretty nasty toxins. The sarge notices some of you are acting a bit strange. Hmmmm, I think it's time to run!


Two paths can be taken at the start, the bloodstained elavator or the creepy cave. Both paths converge at the minecart hub. The cave path contains a short minecart path. There are three minecarts at the hub and each lead to the same place. Pull the levers and get ready for one wild ride! The buttons on the minecart are for the horn , cant get enough of that :P. The rocks on the ceiling can be shot down to crush people and the minecarts will push them out of the way so dont worry if its in your tracks. The mine carts eventually crash and you have to take the rest in foot till you reach the elavator. The "Engineer "there will get the generator running and then tell you to test out his little zday plan. Thank god someone was prepared :P.  Fertilizer and barrels of deisel eh? interesting.
If you want to create new version of this map, then contact Xquality for more info.

This is just a beta for my first ZE map. Ill add more later. The left route is incomplete, the right is complete for the time being.

They both work, I just want to make the left a little longer.

Ze_Mad_DragonballZ!! 
 
 The first ever dragonball z map for Cs:s Zombiemod is now here!!
This escape has 1)64 spawns(advise max 40 players for smooth gameplay)
                       2)Dragonball Z models,including Goku,Vegeta,Piccolo And Radditz! (Credits to Cs:s dbs mod for the models)
                       3)Detonating charge with computer guidance



The Story:
-------------
As part of an American salvage team u are sent on mission to the lab of a mad scientist. Once arrived there there is no sign of the scientist nor his team. Unfortanetly the Artificial Intelligence Unit,AIU in short is still running the to Dragonball Z addicted mad scientists mad expiriments!!
It just so happens that when u and ure team arrive the AIU tests one of its productions resulting in u and ure team getting sucked into the cartoon world of the famous anime.
Not only that but also one of ure teammembers is infected with the Zombination virus.
Ure mission is to get out alive at all cost and saving the world from the zombie plague!

Hint:The Red Ribbon Army studies black holes as a way of traveling from and to dimensions!!
Hint2: When the Cannon fired only one should go into escape,climb island and trigger nuke by hugging the tree,while others hold tunnel.Only when vegeta powersup his galic gun should they fall back!!
Hint3:Blow the houses windows with the computer guided charge to be able to climb house from balcony and climb tower!!

Note!! The map is 34Mb large so u need to put server command net_maxfilesize to above 34 for ppl to be able to download it

ze_madara_temple is a map with one unique stage. An attempt to beat the map is around 20 min. 


Stripper that fix a teleport at the end : https://pastebin.com/aXuYSrgh

There is 7 items for humans (Wind, gravity, rock, ultima, electro, fire, heal) 

4 for zombies (warp, heal, gravity, fire)

This map require a lot of teamwork and the triggers need a bit of movement skill.

My feeling about this map after the different beta version and test on Unloze and NiDE :

I had many feedbacks about the ending of the map. The ending would be better if it was a "teamwin". After the test of the map on different servers I can see that the only wins were solo wins. And this is a bit crual when you spend 20 min of teamwork to die at lasers.
But, nothing as really change, the ending is the same and will stay like this. 

When I created this map, I though to create a really long and hard stage with a hard ending. I only play zombie escape since few month and I saw that there is a lot of experienced players that can beat many maps without real difficulty.

There is not much things related to naruto on this map. Only the boss is Madara. 
And this is why he appear many times in the map. Cause Madara in the Naruto manga is invincible. So even if you damage him at the first phase of lasers, Madara will always appear and try to kill you.
The only way to beat him is to escape the temple and find a safe place.
This is exactly what I thought about when I created the ending of the map.
Hope you guys will still enjoy this map even if you find the ending silly.

To finish, I would say a huge thanks to Moltard for the help on Hammer. Couldnt have finish this map without him.

Good luck and have fun!

_sText:
Secret Stage is now on hold

Map Information

- 6 Stages (3 Normal Stages & 3 Extreme Stages)
- 11items for human
- 2items for zombie
- Bossfights
- Color correction
- NPC

It is a simple map for zombie escape.If there is a problem with the balance please write about it in the comments.
P.S. Forgive me for my bad knowledge of English language.This map can work on old and new CS:S.

UPDATES V4\_2
- Fixed the crash caused by the classname filter on Earendil’s Light.
- Crates now have sightly more health.
- Sightly increased moving doors speed.
- Added a shortcut for the second to the last door opener (it won’t sacrifice).
- Fixed the bug where sometimes the nazgul’s zombie wouldn’t die and keep the high speed. UPDATES V3
- FIXED FOR NEW ENGINE (cs source update)
- Buf fix: you can't break the stairs of Cirith Ungol tower (destroy the way to the Ring/lever)
- Bug fix: no nuke zone
- Balance: no camp spot for humans.
- Force the first zombify timer (5 to 20 seconds)
- Command sv\_turbophysics 1 (to prevent the bouncing physics)
- Balance: +10 seconds of holding in case of ring betrayer.
- Balance: if there are more than 12 humans, a new way will be open for the zombies (more difficult to hold)
- Balance: the wall at the end of the ramp (last escape) opens earlier. UPDATES v2\_3F
- Balance adjustments
- Using of colorcorrection for better lighting
- Improved lighting
- Structure of some parts have been modified.
- Nazgul adjustment (less HP)
- Bouncing physics problem fixed
- Final version A map based on Lord Of The Rings; you will escape through Mordor until reach the Mount Doom, and throw the Ring (or defend the Ring carrier). Special feature, the two random missions:
- Destroy the ring (75% chance): go across Minas Morgul, reach Cirith Ungol, take the ring (2 or 3 humans must take it while the others must defend; humans have 50s to take the Ring),reach the Mount Doom and then:
· Ring carrier throws the ring: he earns 15 points and humans must escape and reach the safety zone.
· Ring carrier jump to the lava: he earns 25 points, and humans can escape 8s earlier and reach the safety zone.
· Ring carrier doesn't throw the ring: he losses -20 points and humans must go into the Mount Doom and defend 40s. - Reach the Mount Doom (25% chance): go across Minas Morgul, reach Cirith Ungol, open the door with a button at top of the tower (like ring), reach the Mount Doom and defend 20s, go into de Mount Doom and defend 30s. Objects:
- The Ring: will appear when the 'Destroy the Ring' mission has been selected.
- The Frodo's light: zombies can't touch the carrier during 10s (when he uses the object). WARNING!!:
- The map is done for servers without respawn (camper clean like in Moria).
